name: Rystar Legend's Time Chasers
description:
Take up detached arm against your friend, or enemy, in this new release made  in collaboration with Rystar Legends made for Windows AND Mac!

As a GameJam game made in 2 weeks, you can play in 1 v 1 matches against a friend, hopping around into different "times", with each time changing the audio, art, and player stats!

Code by Fancy Fairy Co.

Art by Nakiebra Parker.

Music and Voice Acting by Ryan Addi.

Mechanics are simple:

For Player 1, you use the keys WSAD,  to move, and push the key G while holding down a movement input key to attack, like most fighting games.

For Player 2, you use the Arrow Keys,  to move, and push  you the key L while holding down a movement input key to attack.

You play on the same keyboard, and the two players slug it out until you either

1: Kill the opponent, or

2: You both decide you want to stop.

If you want to stop early, there's a button in the top of the screen  you can push to end a match before you killed your opponent.

That's basically all you need to know. (Ignoring the Double Jumping.)

Hope you enjoy!

*Comment what you liked, and any bugs you may have found!*
